il.ac.hit.costmanager.model

Interface IUserDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDAOHibernate

    public interface IUserDAO
    Author:
    Alexey Belogurov & Jacob Graham Provides an interface to our DOA that allows to add users to database , checks if user already exits and validate user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkUserName(java.lang.String username)
      This function get username and check if it's exits in database.
      User userRegister(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password)
      This method adds new user to database.
      User validateUser(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password)
      This method validates username and password.

    • Method Detail

      • userRegister

        User userRegister(java.lang.String userName,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws UserCostsManagerDAOException
        This method adds new user to database.
        Parameters:
        userName - adds to user name in database.
        password - user password.
        Returns:
        the user object for the http session object if the registration succeeded, if not return null
        Throws:
        UserCostsManagerDAOException - if user exites.

      • validateUser

        User validateUser(java.lang.String userName,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws UserCostsManagerDAOException
        This method validates username and password.
        Parameters:
        userName - its user name validate.
        password - user password validate.
        Returns:
        the user object if username and password correct, else return null
        Throws:
        UserCostsManagerDAOException - if username or password arent correct.

      • checkUserName

        boolean checkUserName(java.lang.String username)
               throws UserCostsManagerDAOException
        This function get username and check if it's exits in database.
        Parameters:
        username - its username to check
        Returns:
        true if username exits else false
        Throws:
        UserCostsManagerDAOException - in case the user already exists
